Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Hotel Fabulous location, We loved it !!”
Reviews.Author: Sparktwinkle
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel original hotel booked lost reservation grateful baltimore finding us room short notice thought euros night room wasnt great given room back corner hotel room large bathroom also large view window overlooked apartments next service lift woke us times nights bathroom although large little outdated interesting feature sink water bidet filling almost nice youre trying get clean feeling another negative certainly room lack storage space one wardrobe 8 hangers exactly enough two people hang clothes thought wed found nice drawers put rest things turned fridge false drawers ended leave lot things suitcase nice things though room always clean fresh bed every day evening turn service bonus nice come back evening feel instantly relaxed wouldnt stay feel overpriced service rooms get stay pleasent would recommend hotel providing afford one expensive rooms think way youd treat

Reviews.Title: “Great Location!”
Reviews.Author: Kealoha12
Reviews.Content: hotel suppose 4 star hotel beautiful outside service speak asked deluxe room got room tiny little room drawers shelves hotel placed us corner next service elevator one tiny window overlooking apartments view bathroom large standard hike climb asked room deluxe room another attendant going change us original attendant said rooms booked somehow looked like gotten good price room willing change us

Reviews.Title: “Quality not quantity”
Reviews.Author: MiamiTechnoLawyer
Reviews.Content: stayed baltimore hotel couple days first trip paris wife loved every aspect hotel great location friendly helpful staff nice clean comfortable room took air france bus airport arc de triomphe half mile hotel dont air france customer ride bus economical makes one stop walked hotel neighborhood hotel room cozy comfortable well kept superior room second floor window overlooked side street small balcony enjoy although quiet street wasnt lot see hotel staff nice particularly concierge arranged trip palace versailles us arrived took several phone calls set last minute staff spoke english small grocery store right around corner hotel pick snacks beer wine want save paying room service hotel plenty restaurants within walking distance hotel catch onoff tour bus block away first evening walked eiffel tower three mile away ate dinner cafe du trocadero tourist friendly staff located end kleber sat outdoor tables dinner watch tower light hotel great place stay first paris visit thoroughly enjoyable stay would recommend anyone

Reviews.Title: “Clean and pleasant”
Reviews.Author: minty_me
Reviews.Content: although baltimore cheapest place stay paris keep going back weve stayed three times year weve also stayed cheaper similarly priced hotels one good american point view overall quality pretty good staff quite friendly helpful breakfast selection good albeit expensive normal paris beds best hard soft either rooms quiet side unless front elevator room sizes vary cozy many european hotel room type location perfect front metro walk tour eiffel arc de triomphe champs rooms clean indoor air quality american hotels far feel comfortable welcome stay baltimore

Reviews.Title: “Great Hotel”
Reviews.Author: 2bundles
Reviews.Content: really enjoyed staying hotel comfortable bed lot tv distance eiffel tower triumph destinations easily reached subway never breakfast dinner cant tell anything highly recommend go pub kleber right across street hotel small glass fresh made charged us 10 euro

Reviews.Title: “Small Rooms”
Reviews.Author: badgb21
Reviews.Content: hotels ive stayed price class paris one better ones friendly casual staff efficiently checked temperature controls room worked relatively well flatscreen tv channels bbc news cnn required minimum didnt food hotel need hotels even north america paris good
